description:
A sustainable update to one of The North Face’s most popular snow sport mittens. Windproof and waterproof insulated mitts keep hands toasty whether you're riding the chair, bombing down black diamonds or breaking trail in the backcountry. Water resistant shell fabric with a DWR finish, and a DryVent waterproof insert give you multiple layers of protection from the elements. HeatSeeker Eco insulation and a fleece lining keeps fingers cozy, and a special sleeve can hold a handwarmer on extra-cold days.

  • Outer shell is water resistant and windproof recycled polyester with a DWR finish
  • DryVent™ insert adds waterproof breathable weather protection
  • WindWall™ fleece liner is warm and fully windproof
  • Polyurethane synthetic leather palms for durability and grip
  • 250g Heakseeker™ Eco recycled polyester insulation on the back of the hand
  • 150g Heatseeker Eco recycled insulation on palm
  • 80g Heatseeker Eco recycled insulation in the gauntlet
  • High-pile polyester fleece lining is soft against the skin
  • Etip™ functionality on the thumbs works with touchscreen devices
  • Multiple points of adjustment for a personalized fit
name: The North Face Montana Ski Mitts - Women's
